  • Constructor Details

    • Segment

      public Segment(int stageId, SegmentType type, double location)
      Constructor for segment class.
      Parameters:
      stageId - ID of the stage the segment is a part of
      type - The type of segment i.e. Sprint or HC
      location - Where in the stage the segment occurs (in kilometers)
